tagline: An ultralight, minimal wiki with Markdown, compatible with Heroku.
body:
## Usage

    $ git clone git://github.com/morganp/sinatra_wiki.git
    $ cd sinatra_wiki
    $ gem install bundler     # If not in your global gemset
    $ bundle install
    $ rake db:migrate_devel (sqlite) or rake db:migrate (heroku postgres) 
    $ ruby sinatra_wiki.rb

Then open a browser in [http://0.0.0.0:4567/](http://0.0.0.0:4567)  
To create a page, just type in the URL eg [http://0.0.0.0:4567/monkey](http://0.0.0.0:4567/monkey)  

## Required gems (in Gemfile)
* rubygems
* sinatra
* erb
* maruku
* thin
* haml
* sass
* activesupport
* sinatra-cache
